title: Client Issue
body: Ever since the last client update I've been having issues with the game freezing completely during either the loading screen or when loaded into game. This happens approximately one out of every four games, causing my account to get low priority queue. Obviously this creates the dilemma of not playing LoL or risking having additional penalties tacked on. I've already un/reinstalled the client but to no avail. Any suggestions would be appreciated. Thanks

replies.body:
Game freezes can be caused by a number of factors, though the most frequent cause is problems communicating with your PC's hardware. We've consolidated a list of steps that commonly resolve this in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I recommend starting there.

Let me know if your issue persists. If it does, please let me know if you recently installed windows updates and what version of Windows you run.
